issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
This is a continuation of HIVE-17830, which haven't solved the issue. We need to run "SET \@\@session.sql_mode=ANSI_QUOTES" statement before we run 
select \"NEXT_EVENT_ID\" from \"NOTIFICATION_SEQUENCE\"". We shall keep table name quoted to be in consistent with rest of ObjectStore code. This approach is the same as what MetaStoreDirectSql take (set session variable before every query).
fields.summary: DbNotificationListener fail on mysql with "select for update"
